title: Free RP
body: My friends told be i get 400 free rp at lvl 5 but im lvl 6 now and havnt got any? have they changed this?

replies.body:
Yup, it was changed with the release of hex tech crafting. New players are now awarded with a chest that gives you an Ashe champ shard and a Garen champ shard with enough essence to craft both of them. It also gives you a free skin, either Sherwood Ashe or Sanguine Garen. [You can read more about it here.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ZGErnvY4-hextech-crafting-new-player-chests-to-replace-400-rp)

You can get Tristana and her "Riot girl" skin for free by liking the LoL Facebook page [(instructions)](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751824-How-to-add-Facebook-Tristana-to-your-account)). 

[Dreadknight Garen](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202083184-Promotional-Content-Free-Swag-#h1q2) is also available by following the LoL twitter page and sending a [support ticket to Riot with proof.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)
